title: travelplanner: Could you help me organize a 5-day trip for 2 people starting from Islip to Pennsylvania, covering 2 cities between March 19th and March 23rd, 2022? Our budget is set at $2,700. We require accommodations that allow children under 10 and prefer to rent entire rooms. For our transportation, we prefer not to take any flights. (8ed4336a09a0f61e)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.name: attraction_search

chat_history.content:
# Pennsylvania Road Trip

## Day 1
**Travel:** Islip to Harrisburg by car (3 hours 30 minutes, 214 miles)

**Accommodation:**
- Cozy Nolita Apartment - $170 per night for 2 nights ($340 total)

**Evening activity:**
- Have dinner at one of Harrisburg's highly-rated restaurants:
  - Spiral - Sofitel Philippine Plaza Manila - 4.9 stars - Average cost $222
  - Viva! Argentine Cuisine - 4.1 stars - Average cost $28
  - Cakes & More - 3.0 stars - Average cost $98

## Day 2
**Morning activity:**
- Visit The National Civil War Museum - 40.271994, -76.855356
- Explore the State Museum of Pennsylvania - 40.265713, -76.885759
- See the Harrisburg Artsfest - 40.263578, -76.889796

**Afternoon activity:**
- Check out the Susquehanna Art Museum - 40.270908, -76.889553
- Explore Harrisburg's historic buildings:
  - John Harris-Simon Cameron - 40.256777, -76.878691
  - Harris Tower & Museum - 40.265080, -76.879030

**Evening activity:**
- Have dinner at one of Harrisburg's highly-rated restaurants:
  - Masala Fusion - 3.2 stars - Average cost $13
  - Rustom's Parsi Bhonu - 4.2 stars - Average cost $77
  - Tilak's The Diners - 3.1 stars - Average cost $24

## Day 3
**Morning activity:**
- Travel to Philadelphia by car (2 hours, 116 miles)
- Check into your accommodation:
  - Industrial Loft Living in NYC - $178 per night for 2 nights ($356 total)

**Afternoon activity:**
- Visit the Philadelphia Museum of Art - 39.965570, -75.180966
- Learn about history at the African American Museum in Philadelphia - 39.953261, -75.151756
- Explore the Please Touch Museum - 39.979496, -75.209147
- Admire the architecture of the Rodin Museum - 39.961923, -75.173958

**Evening activity:**
- Have dinner at one of Philadelphia's highly-rated restaurants:
  - Red Ginger Sushi, Grill & Bar - 4.5 stars - Average cost $98
  - Marukame Udon - 4.9 stars - Average cost $100
  - Red Mesa Cantina - 4.6 stars - Average cost $36

## Day 4
**Morning activity:**
- Visit the Independence National Historical Park - 39.949531, -75.149732
- See the iconic Liberty Bell - 39.949610, -75.150282
- Learn about history at the Museum of the American Revolution - 39.948320, -75.145755

**Afternoon activity:**
- Have a picnic in Franklin Square - 39.955663, -75.150450
- Discover the Barnes Foundation - 39.960643, -75.172807
- Explore the Elfreth's Alley Museum - 39.952718, -75.142482

**Evening activity:**
- Have dinner at one of Philadelphia's highly-rated restaurants:
  - Pind Balluchi - 3.7 stars - Average cost $44
  - Brothers Dhaba - 3.8 stars - Average cost $52
  - Gurdas Ram Jalebi Wala - 4.1 stars - Average cost $20

## Day 5
**Morning activity:**
- Visit the Philadelphia Zoo - 39.971496, -75.195538
- Learn about history at the Benjamin Franklin Museum - 39.949462, -75.146899
- Explore the Franklin Institute - 39.958211, -75.173135

**Afternoon activity:**
- Enjoy some retail therapy at Market Square - 40.259017, -76.880753

**Evening activity:**
- Have dinner at one of Philadelphia's highly-rated restaurants:
  - The Moon Under Water - 4.1 stars - Average cost $94
  - Baker Street - 3.6 stars - Average cost $54
  - Hippopotamus - Museum Hotel - 4.4 stars - Average cost $61

---

## Total cost: $1,227
## Total accommodation cost: $516
## Total travel time: 5 hours 30 minutes
## Total driving distance: 330 miles

Note: I was unable to find accommodation options in Philadelphia that allow children under 10, so I have suggested options that accommodate your request for entire rooms. Please ensure to double-check the accommodations' policies before booking.

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
